sourcesContent:
<script setup>
const { text, variant } = defineProps(["text", "variant"]);
</script>
<template>
  <button
    class="home4-button"
    :class="{
      'home4-button-light-variant': variant == 'light',
      'home4-button-dark-variant': variant == 'dark',
    }"
  >
    {{ text }}
    <slot></slot>
  </button>
</template>
<style scoped>
.home4-button {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-family: "Rajdhani";
  color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  line-height: 1.625;
  text-align: center;
  border: none;

  background-color: rgb(200, 157, 102);
  width: 145px;
  height: 56px;
}

.home4-button-light-variant {
  background-color: #fff;
  color: rgb(47, 49, 64);
}

.home4-button-dark-variant {
  color: #fff;
  background-color: rgb(47, 49, 64);
}
</style>
